---
title: "Laboratorio de Investigación Social Abierta"
pagetitle: "LISA Website"
page-layout: custom
format: html
page-navigation: false
toc: false
about:
  image: "resources/imagenes/sharing-default.png"
  id: hero-heading
  template: jolla
  image-shape: rectangle
  
listing:
  - id: componentes
    contents: "componentes/*/index.qmd"
    sort: "date desc"
    template: resources/custom-listings/home-components.ejs
    
  - id: noticias
    contents: 
    - noticias/posts/*/*.qmd
    - "!noticias/posts/drafts/*qmd"
    sort: date desc
    type: grid
    grid-columns: 3
    image-height: 150px
    fields: [image, title, description]
    max-items: 6
    categories: false
    sort-ui: false
    filter-ui: false
    feed: false
    
  - id: actividades
    contents: 
    - actividades/presentaciones/*/*.qmd
    - "!actividades/posts/drafts/*qmd"
    sort: date desc
    type: default
    image-height: 150px
    fields: [title, date, author, description]
    max-items: 3
    categories: false
    sort-ui: false
    date-format: "MMMM YYYY"
    feed: false
    page-size: 100
    
  - id: recomendados
    contents: 
    - recomendados/posts/*/*.qmd
    - "!recomendados/posts/drafts/*qmd"
    sort: date desc
    type: grid
    grid-columns: 3
    image-height: 150px
    fields: [image, title, description]
    max-items: 6
    categories: false
    sort-ui: false
    filter-ui: false
    feed: false
    
  - id: equipo
    template: resources/custom-listings/people-box.ejs
    contents: equipo/posts/*/*.qmd
    sort: date desc
    type: grid
---
